Package session.workspace

Interface Summary
Link A server-side entity containing a method that dispatches calls to the remote object implementation.
Middleware This interface describes the methods that must be provided to a Workspace Driver by a middleware.
RemoteLink  
 

Class Summary
BlockingWorkspaceDriver A Workspace Driver that implements blocking method invocations as the model of computation.
CodedDatatype A class that codes a Datatype to be transmitted via the middleware.
LocationDriver A location is an available site provided by the middleware, that may be used to run components.
NonBlockingWorkspaceDriver A Workspace Driver that implements non-blocking method invocations as the model of computation.
VisibleByteArrayOutputStream TODO Describe this type.
WorkspaceDriver A workspace is a set of locations that do not share any memory space, a set of links connecting pairs of locations and a model of computation that drives its behavior.
